Pre-Game Insights: West Indies aim for a solid start against Papua New Guinea in the opening match of the ICC Twenty20 World Cup 2024.
Nicolas Pooran will play a pivotal role in the middle-order for West Indies.
West Indies boast a formidable batting lineup with players like Powell, Andre Russell, Shimron Hetmyer, Sherfane Rutherford, and Romario Shepherd.
Darren Sammy is back as a coach for West Indies.
West Indies have replaced the experienced but injured Jason Holder with left-arm fast bowler Obed McCoy.
Papua New Guinea has a team loaded with all-rounders and will be making their second appearance in the ICC Twenty20 World Cup.
Assadollah Vala is the captain of Papua New Guinea.
USA will be looking to surprise Canada in their opening game of the ICC Twenty20 World Cup 2024.
Corey Anderson, a former New Zealand player and 2015 World Cup finalist, is part of the USA squad.
Monank Patel leads the USA team as wicket-keeper batter.
The USA have proven their strength by beating Bangladesh 2-1 in the build-up to the tournament and have also beaten Canada 4-0 recently.
